title: Unique 4BR/2BTH Apartment in Great Hyde Park Location! Near UChicago!
neighborhood: Hyde Park, Kenwood, University of Chicago
map_address: S. Dorchester Ave near E. 52nd Street
posting_body: 5213 S. Dorchester   Spectacular four (4) bedroom, two (2) bath, apartment in attractive six (6) unit building featuring gorgeous eat in cabinet kitchen with dishwasher and microwave, ceramic tile baths, large living room, gleaming hardwood floors, and private back porch area overlooking beautifully landscaped backyard.
Great location near shops, restaurants, and steps to U of C shuttle stop.
Contact Chad at Ettinger Realty for more information.
